In  the present case we  carefully considered the facts and submissions and  impose the

following sentence; 3 years  Rigorous Imprisonment and a fine of Rs.  5000/-
in  default
3 months simple imprisonment, additionally we direct the Accused Respondent to pay
JUDGE OF THE COURT OF APPEAL
s. Devika de L.  Tennekoon, J
